title: Lawmakers Pitch A Gas Tax Hike To Replenish Dwindling Highway Funds
teaser: Sens. Chris Murphy and Bob Corker have drawn up a bipartisan proposal to help resolve the Highway Trust Fund's impending financial problems. Their plan would pay for most federal transportation programs with a gasoline tax.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
